title: Genus Macromia
description: **_Macromia_** is a genus of large dragonflies in the family Macromiidae. They are commonly known as river cruisers from their habit of cruising long distances along river banks. Most species of Macromia occur in the tropical Australasian region, with one species being found in Europe, *Macromia splendens*, and a few species occurring in North America.
